extra.enrollment_requirement:
Prerequisites     CISC322 and CISC325 
Exclusion    No more than 3.0 units from CISC423; SOFT423

basic.description: Advanced user interface styles such as multimedia, support for collaboration over the Internet, virtual reality and wearable computers. Processes supporting the design of advanced user interfaces. Implementation techniques. Alternately offered as CISC 425/3.0.
basic.subject: CMPE
basic.title: Advanced User Interface Design
